CatDescriptText: Cutlines of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 9, 1972, pg. 9 reads: "U.L. Guild Fete - One of the season's smartest affairs was the Initial Dinner - Dance sponsored by the Urban League Guild of Pittsburgh. Held at the Allegheny Club in Three Rivers Stadium.  Arthur Edmunds, executive director of the League poses above with Mrs. Henry T. Bowe, publicity chairman (left) and Mrs. Mary Alexander, general chairman of the event. ""A Happy Trio - Attorney Ronald Davenport, Dean of Duquesne Law School and president of the Urban League Board, is flanked by two charmers in Mrs. Charles Chalfont, president of the Urban League Guild, and Mrs. Mildred Wade, co-chairman of the dinner - dance committee.  They are smiling over the success of the affair. - All Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Henry T. Bowe, Arthur Edmunds, Mary Alexander, Mrs. Charles Chalfont, Atty. Ronald Davenport, and Mildred Wade, posed for Urban League Guild of Pittsburgh dinner dance, in Allegheny Club, Three Rivers Stadium
